doc_id: STEERCO-SEPTEMBER 2025 — SMARTONBOARDX STEERING COMMITTEE MEETING MINUTES-3
text:
September marked the turning point from firefighting to recovery.
 Latency fixes rolled out in late August stabilized enterprise integrations, and the onboarding experience improved significantly for Acme Tech and Zenith Retail.
 Customer sentiment began to rebound, and early NPS recovery indicated trust returning.
 However, engineering bandwidth remained stretched, and documentation debt surfaced as a new friction point.
